name: Corruption Sinking
content:
Corruption Sinking

A vast sinkhole where corruption seeps into the earth. Primary Objectives are corruption wells. Secondary markers are essence pools or corrupted monuments. The ground itself seems to be slowly sinking into the depths.


Terrain Features:

  • Corruption wells
  • Essence pools
  • Corrupted monuments
  • Sinking ground

Atmosphere:

The air is thick with the stench of corruption and decay. The ground constantly shifts and sinks, creating an unstable battlefield. Strange lights flicker in the depths of the sinkholes.
